content:
Why Frog is So 
 Ugly 
 
 Mozambican folktale 
 English 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Many years ago, the Lizard 
 
 and the Frog were friends. 
 
 One day 
 
 they decided to lok 
 
 for girlfriends in the 
 
 city. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Frog was jealous 
 
 of the Lizard's shining 
 
 and briliant skin. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 2  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 He said: What did you do to 
 
 lok so beautiful? Lok at 
 
 me,I am so ugly. What can I 
 
 do about my skin? 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Lizard said: 
 
 Listen! Put some water in a 
 
 pot and put it on the fire. 
 
 Next you. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 But the Frog said: I know 
 
 already, I know. Shut up, my 
 
 friend. And he left. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 5  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 So he arived home and put 
 
 some water in 
 
 a pot. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 When the water began to 
 
 boil, he threw himself into 
 
 it. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 7  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 and his skin was burnt 
 
 and his tail came of! 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 8  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 And instead of being 
 
 briliant and beautiful like 
 
 the Lizard, he was even 
 
 more ugly! 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 9
